armsscroll.name: Arms Scroll
armsscroll.desc: +1 rank for the equipped weapon type.

arrowspate.name: Arrowspate
arrowspate.desc: Effective against flying units. Cannot double.

aura.name: Aura
aura.desc: Female units only. Linde can use at rank E.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.desc: Can be used to increase resistance by 7 (effect lowers each turn).

bindingshield.name: Binding Shield
bindingshield.desc: Allows user to open chests. +2 to all stats (except HP and mov). Banishes Earth Dragons at the start of the turn. Marth only.

bonddrop.name: Bond Drop
bonddrop.desc: Increases the support bonus from all partners to the maximum available rank and unlocks base conversations with compatible units.

darksphere.name: Darksphere
darksphere.desc: Nullifies damage dealt by the opponent when held in an unit's inventory. Effect is negated if the opponent has the Lightsphere.

defense.name: Defense
defense.desc: Increases an ally defense by 2 for one turn. Can't go over the class maximum stat and does not stack.

defensebond.name: Defense Bond
defensebond.desc: Increases defense by 2 for one chapter.

defensepotion.name: Defense Potion
defensepotion.desc: Increases defense by 2 for one chapter.

devilaxe.name: Devil Axe
devilaxe.desc: (31 - luck)% chance to damage the user instead of the enemy.

devilsword.name: Devil Sword
devilsword.desc: (31 - luck)% chance to damage the user instead of the enemy.

divinestone.name: Divinestone
divinestone.desc: Effective against manaketes and transformed dragons (except shadow dragons). Strength +10, skilll +7, speed +4, defense +15, resistance +11. Tiki/Nagi only. (Bonuses can't go over 30 Def/Res total.)

dragonpike.name: Dragonpike
dragonpike.desc: Effective against manaketes and transformed dragons (except shadow dragons).

elysianwhip.name: Elysian Whip
elysianwhip.desc: Promotes a pegasus knight at level 10 or above to falcon knight.

excalibur.name: Excalibur
excalibur.desc: Effective against flying units. Male units only. Merric can use at rank E.

falchion.name: Falchion
falchion.desc: Effective against manaketes and transformed dragons (including shadow dragons). Marth only. Can be used as a item to heal 10 HP.

fireemblem.name: Fire Emblem
fireemblem.desc: Allows user to open chests. Marth only.

firestone.name: Firestone
firestone.desc: Strength +8, skill +4, speed +4, defense +9 and resistance +4. (Bonuses can't go over 30 Def/Res total.)

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: Heals ( Magic / 2 + 8 ) HP to all allies.

geosphere.name: Geosphere
geosphere.desc: Raises critical rate of all allies within a 3 square radius by +10.

glass.name: Glass
glass.desc: Restores all HP to one ally.

gradivus.name: Gradivus
gradivus.desc: Can be used as a item to recover full HP.

hammerne.name: Hammerne
hammerne.desc: Repairs an ally weapon or staff to full use. Malicia/Lena only.

hauteclere.name: Hauteclere
hauteclere.desc: Can be used as a item to recover 10 HP.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: Heals ( Magic / 2 + 8 ) HP to one ally.

icestone.name: Icestone
icestone.desc: Strength +5, skill +7, speed +4, defense +13, resistance +8. (Bonuses can't go over 30 Def/Res total.)

imhullu.name: Imhullu
imhullu.desc: Makes the user immune to all attacks. Effect is ignored if opponent is using the Starlight.

immortalaxe.name: Immortal Axe
immortalaxe.desc: Can be used as a item to recover 20 HP.

iotesshield.name: Iote's Shield
iotesshield.desc: User doesn't get affected by effective attacks against flying classes.

levinsword.name: Levin Sword
levinsword.desc: Uses magic and deals damage to resistance.

lifesphere.name: Lifesphere
lifesphere.desc: Heals 20 HP at the beginning of each turn.

lightsphere.name: Lightsphere
lightsphere.desc: Negates Darksphere's effect and enemy terrain bonuses during battle.

luckbond.name: Luck Bond
luckbond.desc: Increases luck by 2 for one chapter.

luckpotion.name: Luck Potion
luckpotion.desc: Increases luck by 2 for one chapter.

magebreath.name: Mage Breath
magebreath.desc: Uses magic and deals damage to resistance. Makes the user immune to all magic attacks.

magestone.name: Magestone
magestone.desc: Uses magic and deals damage to resistance. Makes the user immune to all magical attacks. Magic +7, skill +1, speed -1, defense +11, resistance +10. (Bonuses can't go over 30 Def/Res total.)

magicbond.name: Magic Bond
magicbond.desc: Increases magic by 2 for one chapter.

magicpotion.name: Magic Potion
magicpotion.desc: Increases magic by 2 for one chapter.

masterkey.name: Master Key
masterkey.desc: Can open a chest/door, or lower a bridge.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: Promotes an unit at level 10 or above.

maturitydrop.name: Maturity Drop
maturitydrop.desc: Permanently increases HP growth rate by 20% and all other growth rates by 10%.

mediocre.name: Mediocre
mediocre.desc: Heals ( Magic / 2 + 1 ) HP to one ally.

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc: Heals ( Magic / 2 + 15 ) HP to one ally.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Heals HP as the same damage dealt to the enemy. Female units only.

parthia.name: Parthia
parthia.desc: Can be used to increase resistance by 7 (effect lowers each turn).

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc: Heals ( Magic / 2 + 8 ) HP to one ally.

puresword.name: Pure Sword
puresword.desc: Can be used to increase resistance by 7 (effect lowers each turn).

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: Increase resistance by 7 (effect lowers each turn).

rainbowpotion.name: Rainbow Potion
rainbowpotion.desc: +2 for all stats (except HP) for one chapter.

rapier.name: Rapier
rapier.desc: Effective against cavalry and armored units. Marth only.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: Heals all HP to one ally.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: Brings a ally next to the user.

resistancebond.name: Resistance Bond
resistancebond.desc: Increases resistance by 2 for one chapter.

resistancepotion.name: Resistance Potion
resistancepotion.desc: Increases resistance by 2 for one chapter.

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc: Prevents a enemy from using tomes/staves for 1 turn.

silvercard.name: Silver Card
silvercard.desc: User can buy items for half price (except in the preparations shop).

skillbond.name: Skill Bond
skillbond.desc: Increases skill by 2 for one chapter.

skillpotion.name: Skill Potion
skillpotion.desc: Increases skill by 2 for one chapter.

speed.name: Speed
speed.desc: Increases an ally speed by 2 for one turn. Can't go over the class maximum stat and does not stack.

speedbond.name: Speed Bond
speedbond.desc: Increases speed by 2 for one chapter.

speedpotion.name: Speed Potion
speedpotion.desc: Increases speed by 2 for one chapter.

starsphere.name: Starsphere
starsphere.desc: +2 to all stats (except HP and mov).

strength.name: Strength
strength.desc: Increases an ally strength by 2 for one turn. Can't go over the class maximum stat and does not stack.

strengthbond.name: Strength Bond
strengthbond.desc: Increases strength by 2 for one chapter.

strengthpotion.name: Strength Potion
strengthpotion.desc: Increases strength by 2 for one chapter.

thief.name: Thief
thief.desc: Opens and gets the content of a chest.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.desc: Effective against ballisticians. Uses magic and deals damage to resistance. Cannot double.

vipcard.name: VIP Card
vipcard.desc: Allows user access to secret shops.

warp.name: Warp
warp.desc: Teleports an ally to a traversable square

wingspear.name: Wing Spear
wingspear.desc: Effective against cavalry and armored units. Caeda only.

wrysstaff.name: Wrys's Staff
wrysstaff.desc: Heals ( Magic / 2 + 10 ) HP to one ally.

wyrmslayer.name: Wyrmslayer
wyrmslayer.desc: Effective against manaketes and transformed dragons (except shadow dragons).

wyvernstone.name: Wyvernstone
wyvernstone.desc: Strength +5, skill +4, speed +7, defense +8, resistance +3. (Bonuses can't go over 30 Def/Res total.)
